relics.name: Omnissian Cogitator
relics.description: An ancient device capable of decrypting the oldest runes.

relics.name: Mechanicus Blade Sanctified
relics.description: A relic blessed by the Tech-Priests of Ryza.

relics.name: Transmechanic Interface Key
relics.description: Grants access to sealed archeotech vaults.

relics.name: Plasma Reactor Core
relics.description: A functional core from an ancient starship.

relics.name: Voidship Navigation Chart
relics.description: Records the passage of a lost fleet.

relics.name: Sanctified Servo-Skull
relics.description: Contains the wisdom of a revered Magos.

relics.name: Cog Mechanica Prime
relics.description: A holy cogwheel said to be touched by the Omnissiah.

relics.name: Memory Crystal Theta-8
relics.description: Holds encrypted knowledge from the Dark Age of Technology.

relics.name: Blessed Banner of Mars
relics.description: An ancient standard carried by Mechanicus armies.

records.name: Data-Log 245.M41
records.information: First exploration of Blackstone Fortress Alpha.

records.name: Data-Log 901.M41
records.information: Plasma Reactor Core recovered from Ryza.

records.name: Data-Log 700.M41
records.information: Blessing of the Cog Mechanica Prime.

records.name: Data-Log 300.M41
records.information: Macro-Plasma Annihilator trialed on Forge World Metalica.

records.name: Data-Log 100.M41
records.information: First sighting of Explorator Fleet Gamma-7.

records.name: Data-Log 500.M41
records.information: Banner of Mars recovered and sanctified.
